name: nativescript-bubble-navigation
description: Nativescript plugin for Android & iOS that create beautiful navigation tabs

scripts.ngc: npm i && npm run ngc.clean && node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/.bin/ngc -skipLibCheck -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run ngc
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemo-ng tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios.aot: npm run preparedemo-ng tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run preparedemo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin add ../publish/nativescript-bubble-navigation-1.0.0.tgz && tns install && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android.aot: npm run preparedemo-ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run preparedemo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.ng.reset: cd ../demo-ng && rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.vue.reset: cd ../demo-vue && rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-bubble-navigation && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.ng.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-bubble-navigation && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.vue.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin remove nativescript-bubble-navigation && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.preparedemo: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-bubble-navigation && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.preparedemo-vue: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin remove nativescript-bubble-navigation && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.ng: npm run demo.ng.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.vue: npm run demo.vue.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
